Title: Love Songs (In the Key of Gallagher)
Writer: John Wells (developed for American television by), Paul Abbott (created by), John Wells
Actors: William H. Macy, Emmy Rossum, Jeremy Allen White, Ethan Cutkosky
Plot: Fiona reunites with Gus after his tour but is torn by the fact that her friendly feelings for Sean have turned into love. Plus, Frank has his own love struggles as he works to keep Bianca happy - in Costa Rica.
